verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> he shewed <S%G1166><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> river <S%G4215><s%> of water <S%G5204><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, clear <S%G2986><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> crystal <S%G2930><s%>, proceeding <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%>.

In <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the street <S%G4113><s%> of it <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> on either <S%G2532><s%> side <S%G1782><s%> <S%G1782><s%> of the river <S%G4215><s%>, was there the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, which bare <S%G4160><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> manner of fruits <S%G2590><s%>, and yielded <S%G591><s%> her <S%G846><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G1520><s%> month <S%G3376><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the leaves <S%G5444><s%> of the tree <S%G3586><s%> were for <S%G1519><s%> the healing <S%G2322><s%> of the nations <S%G1484><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G2089><s%> <S%G3956><s%> curse <S%G2652><s%>: but <S%G2532><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the Lamb <S%G721><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> shall serve <S%G3000><s%> him <S%G846><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall see <S%G3700><s%> his <S%G846><s%> face <S%G4383><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> shall be in <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> foreheads <S%G3359><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there shall be <S%G2071><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they need <S%G5532><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> candle <S%G3088><s%> <S%G2192><s%>, neither <S%G2532><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> of the sun <S%G2246><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> giveth <S%G5461><s%> them <S%G846><s%> light <S%G5461><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they shall reign <S%G936><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%> are faithful <S%G4103><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G228><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of the holy <S%G40><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> to shew <S%G1166><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> shortly <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>: blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he that keepeth <S%G5083><s%> the sayings <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book <S%G975><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> saw <S%G991><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> them. And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I had heard <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seen <S%G991><s%>, I fell down <S%G4098><s%> to worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> the feet <S%G4228><s%> of the angel <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> shewed <S%G1166><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>.

Then <S%G2532><s%> saith he <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, See <S%G3708><s%> thou do it not <S%G3361><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> fellowservant <S%G4889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of them which keep <S%G5083><s%> the sayings <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book <S%G975><s%>: worship <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Seal <S%G4972><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the sayings <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book <S%G975><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> at hand <S%G1451><s%>.

He that is unjust <S%G91><s%>, let him be unjust <S%G91><s%> still <S%G2089><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he which is filthy <S%G4510><s%>, let him be filthy <S%G4510><s%> still <S%G2089><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he that is righteous <S%G1342><s%>, let him be righteous <S%G1344><s%> still <S%G2089><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he that is holy <S%G40><s%>, let him be holy <S%G37><s%> still <S%G2089><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> is with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>, to give <S%G591><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> according as <S%G5613><s%> his <S%G846><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> Alpha <S%G1><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Omega <S%G5598><s%>, the beginning <S%G746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%>, the first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%>.

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are they that do <S%G4160><s%> his <S%G846><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G846><s%> may have <S%G2071><s%> right <S%G1849><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> may enter <S%G1525><s%> in through the gates <S%G4440><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>.

For <S%G1161><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> are dogs <S%G2965><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> sorcerers <S%G5333><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whoremongers <S%G4205><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> murderers <S%G5406><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> idolaters <S%G1496><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3956><s%> loveth <S%G5368><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> maketh <S%G4160><s%> a lie <S%G5579><s%>.

I <S%G1473><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> have sent <S%G3992><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> to testify <S%G3140><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%>. I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the root <S%G4491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the offspring <S%G1085><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, and the bright <S%G2986><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> morning <S%G3720><s%> star <S%G792><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the bride <S%G3565><s%> say <S%G3004><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> let him that heareth <S%G191><s%> say <S%G2036><s%>, Come <S%G2064><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> let him that is athirst <S%G1372><s%> come <S%G2064><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever will <S%G2309><s%>, let him take <S%G2983><s%> the water <S%G5204><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> freely <S%G1432><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I testify <S%G4828><s%> unto every man <S%G3956><s%> that heareth <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> book <S%G975><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> shall add <S%G2007><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> shall add <S%G2007><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the plagues <S%G4127><s%> that are written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> book <S%G975><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> shall take away <S%G851><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the book <S%G976><s%> of this <S%G5129><s%> prophecy <S%G4394><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> shall take away <S%G851><s%> his <S%G846><s%> part <S%G3313><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the holy <S%G40><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from the things which are written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> book <S%G975><s%>. out of the book: or, from the tree of life

He which testifieth <S%G3140><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%>, Surely <S%G3483><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> quickly <S%G5035><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>. Even so <S%G3483><s%>, come <S%G2064><s%>, Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.
